creators.name: The Allen Institute for Brain Science

information.value: genomics

title: BrainSpan: Atlas of the Developing Human Brain
description: This resource describes an anatomically comprehensive atlas of the mid-gestational human brain, including de novo reference atlases, in situ hybridization, ultra-high-resolution magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and microarray analysis on highly discrete laser-microdissected brain regions.

storedIn.name: The Allen Institute for Brain Science

primaryPublications.title: Transcriptional landscape of the prenatal human brain
